articles.content:
Films screened 
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Films on the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their revolutionary activities are now on at cinemas and houses of culture in the capital and local areas on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 56th anniversary of the WPK and the 75th anniversary of "Down-With-Imperialism Union."
 Among them are documentary films "our people's honour of holding great leader in high esteem," "the 6th congress of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "care shown to make their lives shine" (a serial).    
 Also screened are feature films depicting the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in the party building including "a summer at Hwasong Uisuk School" (part 1 and 2), "in those unforgettable days" and "the first party commissioner."

articles.content:
Floral basket to WPK from CPC 
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A floral basket came to the c.c., the Workers' Party of Korea from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the WPK.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Wang Guozhang, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, today.

articles.content:
DPRK players place first in Asian roller skating championships 
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK players came first in the men's roller hockey event of the 9th Asian roller skating championships.
 They trounced all rivals with a sweeping lead in scores by mounting hot attacks based on diverse tactics.    
 A prize for the best player was awarded to Pak Ki Bom.

Secretary general of CILRECO arrives
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea (CILRECO), arrived here today.
 He was greeted at the airport by Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
